name: Broccoli Salad with Margarita Dressing
author: *Sherri*
summary: A quick salad that is made with raw broccoli, romaine lettuce, cherry tomatoes, and a few other ingredients that marinate in a simple olive oil and lime dressing. Perfect way to use up all those cherry tomatoes in the garden.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups sliced baby portobello mushrooms
salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup shredded white Cheddar cheese
directions: Mix broccoli, romaine lettuce, grape tomatoes, mushrooms, and red onion in a large bowl with a lid
Place olive oil, lime juice, honey, cilantro, cumin, salt, and black pepper in a blender; blend until smooth
Pour lime dressing over vegetables; toss to combine
Cover and refrigerate salad for at least 2 hours before topping with white Cheddar cheese and serving
